description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Order made to approve the acquisitions of the dependent ownership of the immovable property in Welikada, Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte D/S Division, Colombo District for the constructions under the ADB Assistant Greater Colombo Water and Waste Water Management Improvement Investment Programme and of the immovable property in Thirunagar Passaiypor, Jaffna D/S Division, Jaffna District under the Jaffna Kilinochchi Water Supply & Sanitation Project and of the immovable property in Pungudutivu, J/30 Pungudutive D/S DIvision, Jaffna District under Jaffna Kilinochchi Water Supply & Sanitation Project
